graph_elements.connections¶

Contains the Functionality relating to managing the connections between two nodes.

class graph_elements.connections.Connection(node_a, node_b, weight: float = 1.0)[source]¶

A connection (edge) between two nodes in a graph.

Parameters:

  • node_a (Node) – The source or first node.

  • node_b (Node) – The destination or second node.

  • weight (float, optional) – A weight or capacity for this connection. Defaults to 1.0.

node_a¶

The source or first node of this connection.

Type:

Node

node_b¶

The destination or second node of this connection.

Type:

Node

weight¶

Weight or capacity assigned to this connection.

Type:

float
